home.title: Federico Avelin
home.subtitle: Fullstack Web Developer
home.description: Passionate about building quality software. My focus is on solid architecture, clean code, and the delivery of tangible value through modern web technology.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hi! I'm Federico, a full-stack web developer with {years} years of experience dedicated to building incredible web experiences.

I love transforming ideas into digital reality, paying special attention to code quality and usability. I work comfortably with HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and I really enjoy discovering and using new tools that improve my work.

If you have a project in mind, I'd love to chat and see how I can help you bring it to life!

webService.title: Web Service
webService.description: E-commerce of sales and acquisition of services. Includes cart, payment methods, user panel, chat and many other features.

videogames.title: Videogames
videogames.description: Video games app. Some of the main functions are: video game search, filtering, creation of new video games, paging.

snake.title: Snake React
snake.description: Classic arcade videogame of Snake. It has 3 difficulties, sounds and responsive. Functional on mobile devices.

gifs.title: Gif Finder
gifs.description: Gifs app. Some of the main functions are: GIF search, color selector, add to favorites, carousel.

porfolio.title: Portfolio
porfolio.description: My personal portfolio. Made with React and Typescript. You will find my personal information, projects and technologies.

liteflix.title: Liteflix
liteflix.description: Dynamic movie catalog. Challenge done as challenged for litebox company.
